member.returns: Sets of int predicting the position motifs located in each sequence

member.summary: Calculates the background probabilities for each base

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.GibbsSampler.predictiveUpdateStep(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Int32})
member.summary: One of the sequenceLength sequences, z, is chosen either at random The pattern description q_{i,j} frequency is then calculated from the current positions a_k in all sequences excluding z
member.param: , the sites for the sequences other than z

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.GibbsSampler.getMotifStrings(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Int32})
member.summary: Grabs the motif strings of length motifLength from each sequence and site

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.GibbsSampler.samplingStep(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.Matrix.SequenceMatrix,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Every possible segment of width motifLength within sequence z is considered as a possible instance of the pattern. The probabilities Q_x of generating each segment x according to the current pattern probabilities q_{i,j} are calculated The weight A_x = Q_x/P_x is assigned to segment x, and with each segment so weighted, a random one is selected. Its position then becomes the new a_z.

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.GibbsSampler.calculateMotifProbability(SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.Matrix.SequenceMatrix,System.String,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: calculates the log probability of a character appearing at a specific index in a motif

member.summary: Takes Q a list of log probabilities Replaces negative infinities with 1 less than the minimum log probability

member.summary: Creates a countsMatrix that may be sampled from where columns have informationContentPerColumn information content and there are motifLength columns

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.Matrix.MotifMatrix.initMotifMatrix
member.summary: Initializes the countsMatrix then randomly chooses the probabilities based off of the information content per column

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.Matrix.MotifMatrix.stochasticGradientDescent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Call this upon each row of the countsMatrix 1. Picks a random base to emphasize 2. Maintains an epoch and step counter to add less as epochs go on 3. Randomly picks a base other than the target base and takes step counts from it and gives it to the target base 4. Calculates the Information Content after each loop Loop terminates after the Information Content has been surpassed through taking a step of size 1. If a step of size greater than 1 surpasses the threshold, then the epoch will be undone.
member.param: , row index of motif to perform work on

member.name: M:SMRUCC.genomics.Analysis.SequenceTools.SequencePatterns.Motif.Matrix.MotifMatrix.pickDecrementIndex(System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Picks the index in a row that may be decremented without going negative
member.param: , target index that may not be decremented
